creditline: Gift of Jennifer Speciale-Agnoloni in memory of Tamie Speciale
description: black and white photograph; standing figure, with short, wavy light-colored hair, holding a paper bag in PL hand, and a pair of gloves in PR hand, leaning against an elevator door, gazing outward; door labeled 'ELEVATOR' in CL
portfolio: From The Destruction of Lower Manhattan
text: This is an exceptional gathering of vintage photographs by artists noted for a diverse set of practices, from the abstract to the documentary. Most of these would not be a priority for museum acquisition funds, but are nonetheless vital to strengthening our holdings in 20th century photography.
title: Steelworker, Beekman Street
